Mike is putting the extended transaction protocol on our (JBoss) wiki.  
If there's interest I'll post when it's available.

Mark.


On 9 Jun 2009, at 23:59, Bill Burke wrote:

> With my original post, I wasn't looking for somebody to tell me  
> whether
> or not transactions belong in REST.  I've already heard the arguments
> over and over again, and I already know what the answer is going to be
> from people like Roy and yourself.  I'm more interested in feedback on
> the API Michael Musgrave for JBoss's Transaction Manager.  I want to  
> see
> it revised and reworked for a compensation model as well.  Then  
> finally
> I'd like to sow the seeds to put together some RFC together for it.   
> It
> just seems to me there is a lot of opportunity to take a new look at
> these older standards through resource-oriented glasses.
